CustomField.description: Used in conjunction with Sales Division by Oracle CPQ to determine where to route operations approvals
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL( Sales_Org__c ,'PAS'), Zone__c='67'), 'PEO FL-TX',IF(BEGINS(UserRole.Name,'MMS Sales Rep Mid-Market'), 'L1', ''))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in conjunction with Sales Division by Oracle CPQ to determine where to route operations approvals
CustomField.label: Division Level
